This would take some careful planning, especially considering that all the female characters of the series (including your own host) were after the heart of a male, and that you yourself were now a female.
As you ponder the feasability of this quest, you stand and undress yourself, removing the pilot suit you put on before entering this world.
You approach Houki's dresser, and pull out a bra and panties. You slip on the panties, and put on the bra without difficulty, utilizing your skin's muscle memory.
You pull a white academy uniform from inside Houki's closet. As you don the outfit, you decide that you were up for the challenge of seducing not only a single girl, but forming a harem out of the women of the series.
You don Houki's signature thigh-high socks and boots, and approach the door. Reaffirming your dedication to your new cause, you decide that it is now simply time to find your first conquest, and sow the seeds of your harem-to-be.
You open the door and step out the a seemingly-empty hallway of the dorm.
You close the door behind you, and look right.
Down the hall, you notice...
